briefdescription.para: Updates the scene every frame (Animation/booleans/music etc)
The main render function for this scene, renders any text/meshes.
Renders the skybox on screen with rotation, scaling done.

memberdef.argsstring: (Mesh *mesh, std::string text, Color color, float size, float x, float y)
memberdef.name: RenderTextOnScreen

memberdef.argsstring: (Mesh *mesh, float size, float x, float y, float rotate, float rx, float ry, float rz, float z)
memberdef.name: RenderQuadOnScreen

briefdescription.para: Random camera shaking when explosion happens.
